data.text:
I've made up my mind. 
Today is the day I will scout Transcend.
data.processed:
<story>I've made up my mind. 
<story>Today is the day I will scout Transcend.

data.text:
Tray-chan, Tray-chan! That pen you have... It's from 
that crowdfunder! Now we match, heck yeah!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Tray-chan, Tray-chan! That pen you have... It's from 
<story>that crowdfunder! Now we match, heck yeah!

data.text:
It's so useful, right? 
It works on your phone too and it's so accurate.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>It's so useful, right? 
<story>It works on your phone too and it's so accurate.

data.text:
Ah, you brought hot chocolate today? And the snacks... 
Ooh! I've seen these starting to blow up online. 
They'll be sold out in no-time.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Ah, you brought hot chocolate today? And the snacks... 
<story>Ooh! I've seen these starting to blow up online. 
<story>They'll be sold out in no-time.

data.text:
Our relation is still the same as it has been. 
I'm afraid I've grown too accustomed to this atmosphere. 
It's making it hard for me to bring it up...
data.processed:
<story>Our relation is still the same as it has been. 
<story>I'm afraid I've grown too accustomed to this atmosphere. 
<story>It's making it hard for me to bring it up...

data.text: I know this is supposed to be my job, and I shouldn't have to worry about it so much...
data.processed: I know this is supposed to be my job, and I shouldn't have to worry about it so much...

data.text: I just think she might refuse...
data.processed: <story>I just think she might refuse...

data.text:
It feels like she's just here to help me look for girls 
to scout. Not once has she tried to present herself 
to me as a potential...
data.processed:
<story>It feels like she's just here to help me look for girls 
<story>to scout. Not once has she tried to present herself 
<story>to me as a potential...

data.text:
You seem tired, Tray-chan... 
Too much research lately?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>You seem tired, Tray-chan... 
<story>Too much research lately?

data.text:
Yes, yes... In that case... 
Why don't I energize you with some info I got recently 
about a girl with crazy potential!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Yes, yes... In that case... 
<story>Why don't I energize you with some info I got recently 
<story>about a girl with crazy potential!

data.text:
I take a deep breath to clear my mind. 
Even though I fear getting rejected, the regret of 
not scouting her might be worse...
data.processed:
<story>I take a deep breath to clear my mind. 
<story>Even though I fear getting rejected, the regret of 
<story>not scouting her might be worse...

data.text:
Hmm? 
Or perhaps... You already found your pick?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? 
<story>Or perhaps... You already found your pick?

data.text:
Or are you still thinking about it? Look, how about 
you just listen to me. My info won't disappoint.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Or are you still thinking about it? Look, how about 
<story>you just listen to me. My info won't disappoint.

data.text:
I was about to be ready to tell her and not regret it... 
But without thinking, I went along with her sudden 
pushy request and nodded in agreement.
data.processed:
<story>I was about to be ready to tell her and not regret it... 
<story>But without thinking, I went along with her sudden 
<story>pushy request and nodded in agreement.

data.text:
Perfect. Now, about her... 
Actually, it'd be better if you went to see in person.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Perfect. Now, about her... 
<story>Actually, it'd be better if you went to see in person.

data.text:
She told me to meet her in front of the dorms. 
When I arrived—
data.processed:
<story>She told me to meet her in front of the dorms. 
<story>When I arrived—

data.text: Ah, there you are!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>Ah, there you are!

data.text:
Well, I'd stand out in the school's uniform. 
Now, come with me!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Well, I'd stand out in the school's uniform. 
<story>Now, come with me!

data.text:
She brought me to a vintage café. 
... This special umamusume is supposed to be here?
data.processed:
<story>She brought me to a vintage café. 
<story>... This special umamusume is supposed to be here?

data.text:
Great atmosphere, right? Did you know, 
this place has a mystery menu at certain times of day?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Great atmosphere, right? Did you know, 
<story>this place has a mystery menu at certain times of day?

data.text:
It doesn't taste bad, but the ingredients are secret. 
If you wanna find out, we can try it together sometime.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>It doesn't taste bad, but the ingredients are secret. 
<story>If you wanna find out, we can try it together sometime.

data.text:
I've been looking around, but there are no other 
umamusume in the café. I tilt my head in confusion.
data.processed:
<story>I've been looking around, but there are no other 
<story>umamusume in the café. I tilt my head in confusion.

data.text:
Now, now. No need to rush. 
The day's still young.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Now, now. No need to rush. 
<story>The day's still young.

data.text:
Next, she took me to... an amusement park?! 
And still, no sign of any other umamusume.
data.processed:
<story>Next, she took me to... an amusement park?! 
<story>And still, no sign of any other umamusume.

data.text:
You may think this is yet another 
attraction at first glance.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>You may think this is yet another 
<story>attraction at first glance.

data.text:
But actually, there's a secret store inside it! 
It's invite-only, and you'll be able to find the world's first—
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>But actually, there's a secret store inside it! 
<story>It's invite-only, and you'll be able to find the world's first—

data.text: Hmm?
data.name: Transcend

choices.text: Is this part of the info you promised me?
choices.processed: <size=40>Is this part of the info you promised me?</size>

data.processed: <story>Hmm?

data.text:
Yep, that's right. 
Info about her interests... Her favorite places to go...
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Yep, that's right. 
<story>Info about her interests... Her favorite places to go...

data.text:
...... 
Now, let's get a move on!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>...... 
<story>Now, let's get a move on!

data.text: She took me to several other places.
data.processed: <story>She took me to several other places.

data.text:
All of them were interesting places. 
Places which all remind me of one girl in particular...
data.processed:
<story>All of them were interesting places. 
<story>Places which all remind me of one girl in particular...

data.text: It was impossible not to notice.
data.processed: It was impossible not to notice.

data.text:
Transcend. 
The time we spent together... 
Relaxed, like close friends.
data.processed:
<story>Transcend. 
<story>The time we spent together... 
<story>Relaxed, like close friends.

data.text:
She was merely there to help me with her info. 
Scouting her wasn't on my mind for so long...
data.processed:
<story>She was merely there to help me with her info. 
<story>Scouting her wasn't on my mind for so long...

data.text:
But over time, her running, her way of thinking... 
I realized she might be the treasure I had been looking for.
data.processed:
<story>But over time, her running, her way of thinking... 
<story>I realized she might be the treasure I had been looking for.

data.text:
... She returned to me the courage that I had lost. 
I slap my cheeks to gather it.
data.processed:
<story>... She returned to me the courage that I had lost. 
<story>I slap my cheeks to gather it.

data.text:
Did you know they found a new species of flower here? 
It's not been announced publicly yet, but there's 
a picture of it at the reception.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Did you know they found a new species of flower here? 
<story>It's not been announced publicly yet, but there's 
<story>a picture of it at the reception.

data.text:
Ooh? I've never seen that flower before! 
Isn't it lovely? Gonna have to look that one up later.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Ooh? I've never seen that flower before! 
<story>Isn't it lovely? Gonna have to look that one up later.

data.text:
... So, Tray-chan. 
Did looking at the flowers help you relax?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>... So, Tray-chan. 
<story>Did looking at the flowers help you relax?

data.text:
I guess she noticed how nervous I am... 
I cough to clear my throat, and lift my head.

choices.text: I found the girl I want to scout.

data.processed:
<story>I guess she noticed how nervous I am... 
<story>I cough to clear my throat, and lift my head.

data.text:
Oho? Who is it? 
I'm sure I'll have info on her.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Oho? Who is it? 
<story>I'm sure I'll have info on her.

data.text: It comes at a price, of course!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>It comes at a price, of course!

data.text:
To answer the question, I tell her the girl seems calm 
at first glance, but she has a keen eye for data 
and can be a little cheeky.
data.processed:
<story>To answer the question, I tell her the girl seems calm 
<story>at first glance, but she has a keen eye for data 
<story>and can be a little cheeky.

data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>..!

data.text:
I think she's awfully kind and considerate on the inside. 
At least, that's what she seems like to me.
data.processed:
<story>I think she's awfully kind and considerate on the inside. 
<story>At least, that's what she seems like to me.

data.text: Hey now, I'm supposed to be the one to give you that kind of info. It must've rubbed off on you.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: Hey now, I'm supposed to be the one to give you that kind of info. It must've rubbed off on you.

data.text:
With that witty remark, she averts her gaze. 
I try to step into it on purpose and try to continue 
our conversation.
data.processed:
<story>With that witty remark, she averts her gaze. 
<story>I try to step into it on purpose and try to continue 
<story>our conversation.

data.text:
If I were to scout her, we would be working together 
to reach the race of our dreams. An unknown world, 
thrilling beyond any expectations.
data.processed:
<story>If I were to scout her, we would be working together 
<story>to reach the race of our dreams. An unknown world, 
<story>thrilling beyond any expectations.

data.text:
That which could never be contained by imagination... 
She would make it possible to achieve.
data.processed:
<story>That which could never be contained by imagination... 
<story>She would make it possible to achieve.

data.text:
...... 
I might know... a thing or two about that girl.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>...... 
<story>I might know... a thing or two about that girl.

data.text:
...She says with a sly grin. 
I return a grin of my own.

choices.text: I'd like to buy that info from you.

data.processed:
<story>...She says with a sly grin. 
<story>I return a grin of my own.

data.text:
Heh... Sure, but that girl might be a lot more of a handful 
than all the others you've looked at. 
Think you can take her on?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Heh... Sure, but that girl might be a lot more of a handful 
<story>than all the others you've looked at. 
<story>Think you can take her on?

data.text: I nodded as to say "of course". I haven't seen her eyes sparkle with this much joy before.
data.processed: I nodded as to say "of course". I haven't seen her eyes sparkle with this much joy before.

data.text: I'll start with some advice. If you want to succeed in scouting her, she's gonna need some info about you, Tray-chan.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: I'll start with some advice. If you want to succeed in scouting her, she's gonna need some info about you, Tray-chan.

data.text:
She needs to know what kind of person you are. 
How about it?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>She needs to know what kind of person you are. 
<story>How about it?

data.text:
Yep, let's go back and get some tea and snacks! 
I'll help you out this time. That's only fair.
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Yep, let's go back and get some tea and snacks! 
<story>I'll help you out this time. That's only fair.

data.text:
Also, I think we'll need more time than normal today. 
Do you think you can handle it?
data.name: Transcend
data.processed:
<story>Also, I think we'll need more time than normal today. 
<story>Do you think you can handle it?

data.text: I expect some invaluable info from you today!
data.name: Transcend
data.processed: <story>I expect some invaluable info from you today!
